SEARCH
Package gutek.utils.validation

Class FieldValueValidator

java.lang.Object
gutek.utils.validation.FieldValueValidator
public class FieldValueValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating field values against annotations like NotNull, NotEmpty, Min, Max, and AllowedValues. It also handles value conversion for numeric fields.

  • Method Details

    • validateAndReturnConverted

      public static Object validateAndReturnConverted(Object object, String fieldName, Object value, TranslationService translationService) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates and converts the value of a given field using the field's annotations.
      Parameters:
      object - The object containing the field to validate.
      fieldName - The name of the field to validate.
      value - The value to validate and convert.
      translationService - The translation service used for localized error messages.
      Returns:
      The converted value, if validation passes.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If validation fails.

    • convertValue

      private static Object convertValue(Object value, Class<?> targetType, String fieldName, TranslationService translationService)
      Converts the value to the target type of the field.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to convert.
      targetType - The target type of the field.
      fieldName - The name of the field being validated.
      translationService - The translation service used for localized error messages.
      Returns:
      The converted value.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the value cannot be converted.

    • getPropertyDescriptor

      private static PropertyDescriptor getPropertyDescriptor(Class<?> clazz, String fieldName)
      Helper method to retrieve a PropertyDescriptor for a given field name in a specified class.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class containing the field
      fieldName - the name of the field for which the PropertyDescriptor is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the PropertyDescriptor for the specified field, or null if an error occurs during introspection

    • getField

      private static Field getField(Class<?> clazz, String fieldName)
      Helper method to retrieve a Field by its name from a specified class.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class containing the field
      fieldName - the name of the field to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Field object representing the specified field, or null if the field is not found

    • getFieldLabel

      private static String getFieldLabel(Class<?> clazz, String fieldName, TranslationService translationService)
      Retrieves the label for a specified field, using the translation service if the field has a description key.

      If the field is annotated with AlgorithmHiperparameter, this method will use the translation key provided by the annotation to fetch the translated label via the TranslationService. If no translation key is found, the method returns the field's name.

      Parameters:
      clazz - the class containing the field
      fieldName - the name of the field whose label is to be retrieved
      translationService - the translation service used to fetch the translated label
      Returns:
      the translated label if a description key is present, or the field name if not

    • validateNotNull

      private static void validateNotNull(PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object value, String fieldLabel, TranslationService translationService)
      Validates that the specified value is not null if the field is annotated with NotNull.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - Descriptor for the property being validated.
      value - The value to validate.
      fieldLabel - The label of the field, used in error messages.
      translationService - Service used for obtaining localized error messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is null and the field is annotated with NotNull.

    • validateNotEmpty

      private static void validateNotEmpty(PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object value, String fieldLabel, TranslationService translationService)
      Validates that the specified value is not empty if the field is annotated with NotEmpty.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - Descriptor for the property being validated.
      value - The value to validate.
      fieldLabel - The label of the field, used in error messages.
      translationService - Service used for obtaining localized error messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is empty and the field is annotated with NotEmpty.

    • validateMin

      private static void validateMin(PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object value, String fieldLabel, TranslationService translationService)
      Validates that the specified value is above the minimum if the field is annotated with Min.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - Descriptor for the property being validated.
      value - The value to validate.
      fieldLabel - The label of the field, used in error messages.
      translationService - Service used for obtaining localized error messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is below the minimum specified by the Min annotation.

    • validateMax

      private static void validateMax(PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object value, String fieldLabel, TranslationService translationService)
      Validates that the specified value is below the maximum if the field is annotated with Max.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - Descriptor for the property being validated.
      value - The value to validate.
      fieldLabel - The label of the field, used in error messages.
      translationService - Service used for obtaining localized error messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is above the maximum specified by the Max annotation.

    • validateAllowedValues

      private static void validateAllowedValues(PropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor, Object value, String fieldLabel, TranslationService translationService)
      Validates that the specified value is within the allowed values if the field is annotated with AllowedValues.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - Descriptor for the property being validated.
      value - The value to validate.
      fieldLabel - The label of the field, used in error messages.
      translationService - Service used for obtaining localized error messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not within the allowed values specified by the AllowedValues annotation.
